amendment.description: To provide that funds must be used in a manner consistent with the Bipartisan Trade Promotion Authority Act of 2002.

action.text: Amendmet SA 1713 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 1665.
Amendment SA 1713 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 1713 proposed by Senator Grassley.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1713 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 231.
